Journal.Title: Zhurnal nevrologii i psikhiatrii imeni S.S. Korsakova
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Zh Nevrol Psikhiatr Im S S Korsakova

Article.ArticleTitle: [Protracted depressive states formed under the conditions of a stressogenic situation].

AbstractText: Psychopathological and clinical dynamic aspects of prolonged (duration more than 6 months) depressive states formed under conditions of stressogenic situation were investigated in 63 patients of two Moscow general outpatient clinics in 1994-1995. The general regularities of such depressions' development were established: the periods of initial disturbances, of "psychogenic" depression and of endogenisation. The conditions may progress: with frue affective disorders prevalence; with relative predominance of senesto-hypochondriac and anxious-phobic disturbances; with so called alternating course which was characterised by numerous changes of the leading psychopathological syndrome. The recommendations are given concerning patients' therapy.

Article.VernacularTitle: Formiruiushchiesia v usloviiakh stressogennoĭ situatsii zatiazhnye depressivnyye sostoianiia.
